topics.body: Yeah so apparently Chinese citizens are making huge protests against communism.  A protest in Hong Kong drew in 500k people.  China's president is not happy at all about this and is saying that he may use the army against them.  That seems like a dumb decision cause if a protest is drawing in 500k people then chances are that's going to piss off a lot of people.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b3211a63687224fd880600#post_53b3211a63687224fd880600
 It seems "the Heaven":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mandate_of_Heaven is losing their patience towards this communist dynasty. That is what they get for raping our culture, people, and the land from the Cultural Revolution to now. 
Then again, I hope their fall don't spell the end of China as a civilization and superpower.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

China, as a civilization and culture, has proven itself to be ever persistent and immortal since the early days of civilization.

Something like that. I don't claim to be an expert but as I understand it there are already some pretty big regional and cultural divides in China.

If there is one province that deserves to be the heir, it shall be the cradle of Chinese civilization, Henan.

topics.body:
So I just finished part 1 of Linkara's review of Holy Terror,
Why does Frank Miller have such a massive hate boner for lesbians?

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b32eec6368721e64710300#post_53b32eec6368721e64710300
If I were to guess its just part of his general sleazy, misogynistic insanity.

That review was pure catharsis for me. I loathe Holy Terror. I despise it with every fiber of my being.
